## Principal Investigator

### Dr. Fotis Papadopoulos
**Assistant Professor**  
Department of Neuroscience, Uppsala University

Dr. Papadopoulos leads the lab's research in transgender health and gender dysphoria epidemiology. His work focuses on large-scale registry-based studies and methodological innovation in epidemiological research.

*Research Interests:* Transgender health epidemiology, registry-based research, gender dysphoria, healthcare outcomes
